Package controllers

Interface EnquiryController

All Superinterfaces:
Controller
All Known Implementing Classes:
MainController
public interface EnquiryController extends Controller
EnquiryController is an interface implementing Controller methods for managing Enquiries
Since:
2021-11-12
Version:
1.0
Author:
Teo Xuan Ming

  • Method Summary

    Modifier and Type
    Method
    Description
    int
    addEnquiry(String enquiry, String ownerid, int campid)
    addEnquiry adds an enquiry to the list of enquiries in MainController's attributes also tags the enquiry to the camp and user
    Boolean
    deleteEnquiry(int enquiryid)
    Overriden methods from Enquiry Controller Finalise an enquiry by setting the seen attribute to true so that enquiry can be replied to and points allocated to the responding committee member

  • Method Details

    • addEnquiry

      int addEnquiry(String enquiry, String ownerid, int campid)
      addEnquiry adds an enquiry to the list of enquiries in MainController's attributes also tags the enquiry to the camp and user
      Parameters:
      enquiry - the enquiry text to be added
      ownerid - the owner of the enquiry, which should be a student
      campid - the camp the enquiry is about
      Returns:
      the enquiry id if successful, -1 if not

    • editEnquiry

      int editEnquiry(int enquiryid, String enquiry) throws ControllerItemMissingException
      Edit an enquiry
      Parameters:
      enquiryid - the enquiry id to be edited
      enquiry - the new enquiry text
      Returns:
      the enquiry id if successful, -1 if not
      Throws:
      ControllerItemMissingException

    • getEnquiry

      String getEnquiry(int enquiryid)
      Get an enquiry text based on enquiry id
      Parameters:
      enquiryid - the enquiry id to be retrieved
      Returns:
      the enquiry text if successful, null if not

    • getEnquiries

      HashMap<Integer,String> getEnquiries() throws ControllerParamsException, ControllerItemMissingException
      Get all enquiries that fulfill the filter specified from the filter methods
      Returns:
      a HashMap of enquiry id and enquiry text
      Throws:
      ControllerParamsException
      ControllerItemMissingException
      See Also:
      • Controller.FilterCamp(int)
      • Can be filtered by campid and userid Clears the filter after getting the enquiries

    • deleteEnquiry

      Boolean deleteEnquiry(int enquiryid) throws ControllerItemMissingException
      Overriden methods from Enquiry Controller Finalise an enquiry by setting the seen attribute to true so that enquiry can be replied to and points allocated to the responding committee member
      Parameters:
      enquiryid - the enquiry id to be finalised
      Returns:
      true if successful, controller item missing exception if not
      Throws:
      ControllerItemMissingException

    • finaliseEnquiry

      Boolean finaliseEnquiry(int enquiryid) throws ControllerItemMissingException
      Overriden methods from Enquiry Controller Finalise an enquiry by setting the seen attribute to true so that enquiry can be replied to and points allocated to the responding committee member
      Parameters:
      enquiryid - the enquiry id to be finalised
      Returns:
      true if successful, controller item missing exception if not
      Throws:
      ControllerItemMissingException

    • isEnquiryEditable

      Boolean isEnquiryEditable(int enquiryid) throws ControllerItemMissingException
      Overriden methods from Enquiry Controller Check if an enquiry is editable If an enquiry has been finalised, (i.e.seen attribute is true), it is not editable
      Parameters:
      enquiryid - the enquiry id to be checked
      Returns:
      true if editable, throws controller item missing exception if not
      Throws:
      ControllerItemMissingException

    • getEnquiryOwner

      String getEnquiryOwner(int enquiryid) throws ControllerItemMissingException
      Overriden methods from Enquiry Controller Get the owner of an enquiry
      Parameters:
      enquiryid - the enquiry id to be retrieved
      Returns:
      the owner of an enquiry if successful, controller item missing
      Throws:
      ControllerItemMissingException

    • getEnquiryHostCamp

      int getEnquiryHostCamp(int enquiryid) throws ControllerItemMissingException
      Overriden methods from Enquiry Controller Get the camp of an enquiry
      Parameters:
      enquiryid - the enquiry id to be retrieved
      Returns:
      the camp of an enquiry if successful, controller item missing
      Throws:
      ControllerItemMissingException

    • saveReply

      int saveReply(int enquiryid, String reply) throws ControllerItemMissingException
      Overriden methods from Enquiry Controller Save the reply to an enquiry under the replies attribute
      Parameters:
      enquiryid - the enquiry id to be replied to
      reply - the reply text
      Returns:
      the enquiry id if successful, -1 if not
      Throws:
      ControllerItemMissingException

    • getReplies

      ArrayList<String> getReplies(int enquiryid) throws ControllerItemMissingException
      Overriden methods from Enquiry Controller Get the replies to an enquiry
      Parameters:
      enquiryid - the enquiry id to be retrieved
      Returns:
      the replies to an enquiry if successful, controller item missing
      Throws:
      ControllerItemMissingException
